alert.note: Alert for Orofino, Grangeville Region (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 06 at 10:19PM MDT by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Idaho and southwestern Clearwater Counties through 1000 PM PDT... At 918 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 13 miles south of Craigmont, or 16 miles northwest of Grangeville, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half-inch size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Kooskia, East Kamiah, Cottonwood, Stites, Ferdinand, Winona, Keuterville, Pardee and Woodland. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
